title: Indonesian Academic Document Intelligence
summary: Methods and prototypes for extracting structured information from academic documents, combining NLP and vision for robust pipelines.

title: Multimodal AI for Classroom Engagement Analysis
summary: Exploring privacy-aware multimodal signals to support teaching and learning analytics in classroom settings.

title: RAG for Student Support
summary: A retrieval-augmented assistant prototype to help students find policy and academic information with citations and guardrails.

title: Responsible AI Evaluation Toolkit for University Use
summary: A lightweight evaluation toolkit and documentation templates to support fairness, privacy, and governance checks for AI projects.
